name: Deer Shooting Season: Buck Animal Safari Hunting Tournament Challenge
name_original: Deer Shooting Season: Buck Animal Safari Hunting Tournament Challenge
description:
Take control of a hunter in the intense, latest installment in the Deer Shooting Season; Buck Animal Safari Hunting Tournament Challenge. Hunt as many deer as you can before the time runs out!

Practice by yourself, or use our Hunt Online feature to play Real-Time Multiplayer against both friends and strangers!

!! Download This Awesome Game Now While It's FREE !!
